src:
Hasil Pertandingan Manchester City vs Southampton: Skor 2-1
03 Nov 2019, 00:25 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Manchester City harus berjuang ekstra keras di pekan ke-11 Premier League melawan Southampton, Sabtu (2/11/2019) malam WIB. Bermain di Stadion Etihad, Man City sempat tertinggal meski akhirnya menang dengan skor 2-1 atas Soton.
Southampton dalam kondisi buruk usai kalah 9-0 dari Leicester dan 3-1 dari Man City. Hanya saja, Soton tampil lepas dan unggul lewat gol James Ward-Prowse di babak pertama.
Man City membalikkan kedudukan di babak kedua. Sergio Aguero dan Kyle Walker membawa The Citizen menang dengan skor 2-1. Man City masih menempel Liverpool di klasemen dengan selih enam poin.
text:
Manchester City vs Southampton Results: Score 2-1
Nov. 03 2019, 00:25 by Bola.net
Soccer - Manchester City must fight extra hard in Week 11 of the Premier League against Southampton on Saturday (11/02/2019) evening hrs. Playing at the Etihad Stadium, Man City was left behind despite eventually winning by a score of 2-1 over Soton.
Southampton in poor condition after losing 9-0 to Leicester and 3-1 to Man City. Only, Soton appeared loose and superior through James Ward-Prowse's goal in the first round.
Man City reversed the position in the second round. Sergio Aguero and Kyle Walker helped The Citizen win 2-1. Man City are still attached to Liverpool in the standings by six points.
